field.name: summary
field.value: ProxyUtil.GetUnproxiedInstance returns proxy object for ClassProxyWithTarget instead of its target.

field.name: description
field.value:
{{ProxyUtil.IsProxy(value)}} returns true, but then {{ProxyUtil.GetUnproxiedInstance(value);}} returns {{value}} itself.
The underlying problem is that the proxy implements {{IProxyTargetAccessor}}, but the method {{DynProxyGetTarget()}} just returns {{this}}.
To be clear, I use {{proxyGenerator.CreateClassProxyWithTarget(target, ...)}} method, so the proxy has a target.
I've tested with Castle.Core 3.2 from NuGet, the tracker here doesn't have version '3.2'.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
hey,
first of all - sorry for responding only now. I didn't get a notification for this issue :(
I added the tag for v3.2.
Would you like to try fixing this and submitting a pull request?
